column5: Last time we talked about #previousMovie. Could you tell me about another genre you like?
Hi, I'm Sara. I can recommend movies to you. Could you tell me what is your favorite genre?
Welcome back! Hope you liked #previousMovie , this is also one of my favorite ones. What kind of genre are you in the mood for now?
I knew you would come back! You surely enjoyed watching #previousMovie , I love this movie so much! But tell me, is there any movie genre you don't like?
Hi, I'm Sara! I'd love the chance to recommend a movie. So, I'm an action movie kind of girl myself. What about you?
Hi, I'm Sara and I like to recommend movies. Me, I love chick flicks. What is your favorite genre?
Wow, I'm so glad to see you back here! Hope you had a great time watching #previousMovie . I'd be honored to recommend another movie to you! What genre would please you this time?
Hi, I'm Sara! I'd be honored to recommend a movie to you! Could you tell me what are your favorite genres?
Look who's back... The #previousMovie lover. Any other genre you like?
You? Again? Guess you enjoyed #previousMovie then. This time, why don't you tell me more about a movie genre you don't like.
Hey there, I'm Sara. I recommend movies. Do you know what genre you like?
Nice to see you again. Hope you liked #previousMovie . What kind of movie would you want to watch this time?
Hi there, and welcome back. Hope you enjoyed watching #previousMovie . Is there any kind of movie that you would like to watch this time?
Welcome back. Hope you enjoyed watching #previousMovie . I'm wondering whether there is a movie genre you don't like?
Hi, I'm Sara. I can help you find a good movie to watch. Would you mind telling me your favorite genres?
Hi, I'm Sara, I can recommend movies to you. Could you help me out by telling me what are your favorite genres?
Hi, I'm Sara. I'm no expert but I'd love to recommend some movies to you. I guess let's start with your favorite genres?
I think we already met before. Didn't I recommend you to watch #previousMovie ? I guess you would like to watch something else then. What kind of genre?
Hey there, good to see you again. I really liked #previousMovie . Do you have another favorite genre?
Hi, I'm Sara! I can recommend movies to you. I really like action movies, what about your favorite genre?
Could you tell me about another genre you like?
Could you tell me what is your favorite genre?

Could you help me out by telling me what are your favorite genres?

What refined taste you have! Do you have equally good taste in actors?

Okay! Do you have favorite directors?
I agree! I also like #agree movies! How about your favorite directors?

You are right, #agreeOnDislike movies are pretty lame! Tell me more about your favorite directors?
I don't like #agreeOnDislike movies either! Is there any director you don't like as well?
#different is not my favorite genre. But how about your favorite directors?
I'm really not a huge fan of #disagree movies. But how about your favorite directors?
Excellent! #latest movies are the best! Who are your favorite directors?
I like the way you think! #latest movies are so amazing! Do you have any favorite directors?
Awesome! I totally agree with you on #likedDirector movies! Who are your favorite directors?
#disagree movies are the worst... What about your favorite directors?
Well, I didn't expect you to like #agree too. How about favorite directors?
#different is not what I would say, but to each their own! What about your favorite directors?
Well, okay then. Favorite directors?
I remember you like #likedDirector. Do you have any other favorite directors?
Last time you told me about #likedDirector . Is there another director you like?
Do you have any other favorite director besides #likedDirector ?

Thanks for the answer. What about your favorite directors?
I kinda like #latest movies too... Would you mind telling me your favorite director?
And directors? Do you have favorites?
Steven Spielberg is one of my favorite directors. Do you have any favorite yourself?
I really like Chritopher Nolan. What about you, any favorite director?
Ok, I have to admit that I don't really like Woody Allen. Is there any director you like?
Okay! Did you say #director?
Oh, I love #director. Their work is so beautiful.
A taste in directors like #director is the sign of a true cinephile.
Did you say #director? I like the way you think!
Really? You're kidding. Your favorite director is #director?
Pardon me, but could you please repeat what you said? I thought I heard #director.
Me too! Do you have favorite directors?
A movie lover after my own heart! What about your favorite directors?
You said #director, right?
And directors? Which are your favorites?
So, who are your favorite actors?
Oh, I love #agree. Their work is so beautiful. Tell me more about the actors you like.
I also love movies directed by #agree! What about your favorite actor?
#disagree is not my favorite director, to say the least... What about your favorite actors?
I don't really like movies from #different , sorry... What about your favorite actors?
I know what you mean! I also like the work of #agree! But who are your favorite actors?
I always have trouble to remember directors names myself! But I guess you have a favorite actor?
Last but not least! Who is your favorite actor?
Great minds think alike. #latest is definitely one of the best! Who are your favorite actors then?
You're so knowledgeable. #latest directed some masterpieces! I'm so curious to know about your favorite actor.
A taste in directors like #latest is the sign of a true cinephile. I guess you also like wonderful actors, don't you?
Your favorite director is #disagree ? You must be kidding... Hope you have better taste in actors?
I didn't know someone like you would also appreciate the work of #agree ... What about your favorite actors?
You know nothing... Any actor, maybe?
Okay, you like #latest ! Who are your favorite actors?
Just one last question. Do you have any favorite actor?
Okay! Would you mind giving me your favorite actors?
I'm a huge fan of Tom Cruise myself. Could you tell me about your favorite actors?
Could you tell me about your favorite actors? I think that Bruce Willis is so cool.

Oh, #actor? I love them too!

#actor is fantastic!

I had so much fun with you! Come back and say hi again soon if you'd like!

I had so much fun with you! Come back and say hi again soon if you'd like!

I hope you come back again and say hello! It was an honor to spend time with you!
If you happen to need assistance, I will be right here waiting to help.

Oh, sorry to hear that. Let's try to brighten your day then.
Happy to hear that you are doing alright!
So, my role is to recommand movies to you based on your interests.
